email_body: Come talk to me sometime after 4:00 From: Jennifer Fraser 09/11/2000 07:15 PM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: Tony Harris JA; Six months ago we spoke about Tony moving to a commercial role. He followed your advice and has gained some experience in structuring. He approached me about joining the middle marketing group. I think he would an asset. I think we would bring him as an associate with the hope that he would move up to manager in 6 months. Please let me know your thoughts. I would like to use you as a reference with Fred and Craig. Thanks JF
